text: West Union may refer to several places in the United States: * West Union, Illinois * West Union, Indiana * West Union, Iowa * West Union, Minnesota * West Union, Missouri * West Union, New York * West Union, Ohio * West Union, Oregon * West Union, South Carolina * West Union, West Virginia ** Dallas, West Virginia, also known as "West Union, West Virginia" ==See also== * West Union Township (disambiguation)
title: West Union
